item.title: Challenge 3 - Creating Real-Time Web Applications with Docker and PostgreSQL
item.description: Welcome to Challenge 3 in our cloud-native application development journey, where we integrate real-time interactions using Docker and PostgreSQL!

item.title: Install Veeam Kasten on a Kubernetes cluster running on kind
item.description: In this guide, we’ll walk through the process of installing Veeam Kasten on a Kubernetes cluster running on kind (Kubernetes in Docker).

item.title: Deploying WordPress and MySQL on Kubernetes with Kind: A Step-by-Step Guide
item.description: This blog is inspired by an article from the Kubernetes website teaching how to deploy WordPress and MySQL on Minikube, but since I found it very confusing and wanted to use Kind, I’m writing this step-by-step guide.

item.title: Understanding Load Balancer vs. Ingress in Kubernetes
item.description: In the world of Kubernetes, managing traffic flow and exposing applications externally is a crucial aspect of application deployment.

item.title: My Adventure at KubeConEU 2024
item.description: Well well well, it looks like I made it back from another epic KubeCon + CloudNativeCon adventure in Paris, France!

item.title: How to Pass the KCNA - Kubernetes And Cloud Native Associate
item.description: Yesterday I took the Kubernetes and Cloud Native Associate Exam (KCNA) certification exam, and this morning I got the results that I passed, yey!

item.title: On-Premises, IaaS, PaaS, SaaS, or FaaS: A Car Analogy
item.description: In today’s digital landscape, businesses have a wide range of options when it comes to deploying and managing their IT infrastructure.

item.title: Choose Your Tech Career: Software Engineering or DevOps?
item.description: Are you struggling to decide between two exciting tech career paths: software engineering and DevOps engineering?

item.title: An Easy Way to Understand Docker
item.description: Docker is renowned worldwide as an open-source container service provider, that excels in packaging applications and their components, along with dependencies, simplifying the deployment process.
